Perceptor/Kup

> Torca turned to face Kup completely, his optics thoughtful, "Could it
> be because the Predacons were trying to convert her like they did with
> Rodimus and Windlord?" Torca said as he glanced over at Kup as he
> worked on Windlord and then over at Perceptor, "Perhaps you have an
> answer for this?"

"she was actually reprogramed"answered Perceptor"this time it was easier to
do it, her spirit was broken after months of captivity and abuse, more
mentally than fisical..."

"What Happened there Perceptor?" said Kup whose varely could restrain his
rage.

"Several things"said dryly the male"But I will tell you when the Macximal 
comander comes back with Rodimus, and without the child presence"


> Bantor quirked an optic ridge (eyebrow) as he stepped out of the door
> and could see Elita a few doors down trying to sneak into the
> operating room. However it was not Bantor who said anything but it was
> Silverbolt as he stood still watching the operation, a silent
> sentinel, a guardian of the proceedings.
>
> Silverbolt looked at Eilta and stepped foward to hold the door closed
> so she couldn't get in. "What are you trying to do youg one?"
> Silverbolt said in gentle tones to Elita, "We have to wait out here
> until the operation is complete."
>
> From down the hall Bantor nodded as he saw that Silverbolt had the
> situation well in hand, he stepped back in the room with Torca, he
> looked over at Kup, "Your young ward is awake." He said to Kup.

"I wnat to stay with my dad, i want to see him"said elita almost crying

"Straigh Shot"said Kup"could you care Elita a while? Please, she... She 
shouldnt... she shouldnt.. "

Kup couldnt finish the prhase, his sadness overhelmed him
